cr.title: Financial Services and General Government Appropriations Act, 2008
cr.topics: Financial Services and General Government Appropriations Act, 2008: ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS
cr.excerpt: Mr. Chairman, I urge a "no" vote and yield back the balance of my time.

cr.title: South Orange County Recycled Water Enhancement Act
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, first of all, I want to thank staff on both sides who have been working collaboratively and in a bipartisan manner. Water knows no political colors or boundaries. I think we need to work together to be able to ensure that our economy continues growing, that water will continue to flow through the faucets and in the rivers and...

cr.title: Alice Paul Women's Suffrage Congressional Gold Medal Act
cr.excerpt: I thank my good friend and colleague, Joe Baca, from California for authoring this important legislation and thank Judy Biggert for supporting H.R. 406, the Alice Paul Congressional Gold Medal Act that would honor a true pioneer, one of the original suffragettes, as the progress of women's rights and equality continues to be such a strong need...

cr.title: Federal Railroad Safety Improvement Act of 2007
cr.topics: Federal Railroad Safety Improvement Act of 2007: OTHER
cr.excerpt: Mr. Chairman, I thank Chairman Oberstar and Ranking Member Mica and all my colleagues. This is a very important bill to continue making the FRA the safety agency it's supposed to be. We need to be able to ensure that any railcar traveling in the U.S. carries the same safety inspection standards as any other railcar. So, with that, I ask ...

cr.title: Mental Health Month
cr.excerpt: Mr. Speaker, I yield back the balance of my time.

cr.title: Iraq War Resolution
cr.excerpt: I thank the gentleman for yielding. Mr. Speaker, I join my colleagues in total opposition to the President's plan, a plan that escalates the number of our young men and women, American troops, being sent to Iraq. But what are we talking about? What are the words in this resolution? It says, Resolved by the House of Representatives that, one,...

cr.title: Immigrant Soldiers
cr.excerpt: Thank you, Congressman Gonzalez. Thank you for allowing the Hispanic Caucus to speak today on this very important issue of Hispanic veterans and the problems that we have seen them face. I would like to relate a story of SGT Henry Meraz, an Army veteran of the Vietnam War, who lives in my district. Sergeant Meraz grew up in El Paso, Texas...
